original_title: Sri Lanka signs agreement with Sinopec on fuel import
original_body_lines: The Agreement was signed with Sinopec Fuel Oil Lanka (Pvt) Ltd for a long-term contract regarding the importation, storage, distribution and sale of petroleum products in Sri Lanka, the President's Media Division (PMD) said.

The PMD said following the recommendations of the Cabinet Appointed Special Committee, negotiations have been completed with Sinopec Fuel Oil Lanka (Pvt) Ltd and its parent company in China and Singapore for a long-term contract regarding the importation, storage, distribution & sale of petroleum products in Sri Lanka.
The Agreement in this regard was signed a short while ago at the Presidential Secretariat.
